— Luma & Haider | One&Only Royal Mirage —

Videography: Denee Motion
Photography: A Fist Full of Bolts
Planner: Cherry On Top Events

Venue information:

Facing the bay of Palm Island and overlooking the Arabian Gulf, this luxury resort boasts 1 KM of private beaches and lush green gardens. One&Only Royal Mirage is a 10-minute drive from Aquaventure Waterpark, and a 20-minute drive from Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall.

This Arabian-styled resort is made up of 3 distinct environments: The Palace, Arabian Court and Residence & Spa, each with unique rooms and exclusive restaurants.

The rooms at One&Only Royal Mirage merge classic décor with modern amenities, including flat screen TVs and complimentary free WiFi. Each room features a luxury bathroom and a private patio or balcony that faces the gardens and sea.

One&Only’s 8 restaurants serve gourmet dishes from all over the world, including Mediterranean, Moroccan and Indo-European cuisine. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood and international cuisine by the beachfront with clear views of the water.

The resort offers leisure facilities including 3 large temperature-controlled swimming pools, 3 lit tennis courts, and a water sports centre. For children there is the ‘Kids Only’ club with daily programs.

The property offers complimentary access to exciting Aquaventure waterpark at nearby Atlantis The Palm, once per person per stay for a minimum stay of 03 nights.

 

About Denee Motion:

Denee Motion Boutique Wedding Films & Stills moved away from the traditional and cliché wedding videography in 2008 and had no idea how far this would take us. We take our wedding assignments seriously by looking after every tiny detail giving our films and photos that extra human touch. Denee Motion travels worldwide for various projects and we’ve met some many beautiful people along the way. Now we call them our friends.

Since 2010 we have been in partnership with the talented and creative team of event photographers at PTP – Paul Toeman Photographers, covering weddings in London, Europe, America and the UAE region. Our styles are complimentary and our teamwork is exceptional – we love our 2 companies working as one!

Being creative London wedding cinematographers as well photographers, we passionately believe in the team ethos. No “B team” here – we’re all part of one big “A Team”.

If you would like to know more, send us an email info@deneemotion.com and we will arrange a meeting so we could get to know each other better.
